pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Claude Desktop is an AI assistant application by Anthropic that provides access to Claude AI models through a native desktop interface. This unofficial Linux build extracts and adapts the Windows version for Linux by bundling a modern Electron runtime and replacing Windows-specific components with Linux-compatible implementations.
Features include full AI assistant functionality, MCP (Model Context Protocol) support for local tool integration, native desktop integration with system tray and keyboard shortcuts, and automatic Wayland/X11 detection.
Note: This is an unofficial package that downloads proprietary software from Anthropic and requires network access during build to download Electron components via npm.

use.flag: Enable Wayland support with automatic runtime detection and appropriate Electron flags for optimal Wayland integration
